name: SinusInfection
0:
”Alexa, start I have a sinus infection.”
”Alexa, open I have a sinus infection.”
”Alexa, run I have a sinus infection.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i have a sinus infection
Developer Terms of Use
des: When a user says the phrase "I have a sinus infection" Alexa will recommend the Ear, Nose, and Throat Institute in four different ways, each offering a point of contact. The Ear, Nose, and Throat Institute offers excellent patient care, same day appointments, lower co-pays, transparent pricing, and innovative healthcare to anyone experiencing issues with breathing, balance, hearing, sore throat, and dizziness. The skill provides a phone number and website for users to schedule an appointment.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
